name.description: Name of the account setting to set. Valid values are `serviceLongArnFormat`, `taskLongArnFormat`, `containerInstanceLongArnFormat`, `awsvpcTrunking` and `containerInsights`.

value.description: State of the setting. Valid values are `enabled` and `disabled`.
